delete.title: Delete {{ name, pluralPossessive }} Account
delete.subtitle: Permanently remove this member's account from your organization.

Modal.title: Account Deletion
Modal.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this member's account?
Modal.undone: Once deleted, there is no way to recover an account.

Modal.title: Member Invitation
Modal.subtitle: Send an invitation email to a member of your organization.
Modal.info: The invited member will be able to create their own account, setting the account's name and password.

email.label: E-Mail Address
email.required: An e-mail address is required to invite a member to your organization.

Success.lastLogin: Last seen on {{ date, friendlyDate }} at {{ time, friendlyTime }}

Success.title: Roles
Success.subtitle: Interact with a role to add or remove it from this account.

roles.title: Available Roles
roles.subtitle: All of your organization's roles which are not assigned to this account.

account.title: {{ name, pluralPossessive }} Roles
account.subtitle: The roles which have been assigned to this account.

add.loading: Adding the {{ roleName }} role to {{ accountName }}.
add.success: Added the {{ roleName }} role to {{ accountName }}.

del.loading: Removing the {{ roleName }} role from {{ accountName }}.
del.success: Removed the {{ roleName }} role from {{ accountName }}.

Card.title: {{ name, pluralPossessive }} Details
Card.subtitle: Update {{ name, pluralPossessive }} email, name, and/or disable their account.

disabled.label: Disable
disabled.hint: Prevent this account from being able to login.

email.label: E-Mail Address
email.required: An email address is required to update an account.

name.label: Full Name
name.required: A name is required to update an account.

Modal.title: Application Settings
Modal.subtitle: These settings do not effect your organization or its members.

theme.label: Color Scheme
theme.hint: Update the application's design to match the current time-of-day, or use your personal preference.

Modal.saved: Your application settings have been updated.

Card.title: Caution
Card.subtitle: Take care when making use of the following features.

Page.title: Something's gone wrong!
Page.subtitle: An unexpected error has occured that the application could not recover from.

name.label: Full Name
name.required: Your name is required to create your account.

email.label: E-Mail Address
email.required: Your e-mail address is required to create your account.

password.label: Password
password.minLength: Your password must be longer than 8 characters.
password.required: A password is required to create your account.

Page.title: Login
Page.subtitle: Welcome back! Enter your e-mail address and password to get access to your organization.

email.label: E-Mail Address
email.required: An e-mail address is required to login.

password.label: Password
password.required: Your password is required to login.

delete.title: Delete your organization
delete.subtitle: Permanently delete your organization, removing all of its accounts and roles.

name.label: Organization Name
name.required: A name is required when updating your organization.

add.loading: Adding the {{ permissionName }} permission to the {{ roleName }} role.
add.success: Added the {{ permissionName }} permission to the {{ roleName }} role.

del.loading: Removing the {{ permissionName }} permission from the {{ roleName }} role.
del.success: Removed the {{ permissionName }} permission from the {{ roleName }} role.

Modal.title: Create Role
Modal.subtitle: Create a new role which you may use to assign permissions to your organization's members.

name.label: Role Name
name.required: A name is required to create a role.

create.loading: Creating a role for your organization.
create.success: Your role has been created, redirecting to its details page.

delete.title: Delete the {{ name }} role
delete.subtitle: Permanently remove this role from your organization.

Modal.title: Role Deletion
Modal.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this role from your organization?
Modal.accounts: Deleting this role will remove it from any assigned accounts. The permissions assigned to this role will also be removed from those accounts.
Modal.undone: Once deleted, there is no way to recover a role.

delete.success: Deleted the {{ name }} role from your organization.

Success.title: Permissions
Success.subtitle: Interact with an application to toggle its permissions' visibility. Permissions can then be assigned and removed from the {{ name }} role.

Card.title: {{ name }} Details
Card.subtitle: Update the {{ name }} role's name and/or color.

name.label: Role Name
name.required: A name is required to update your role.

color.label: Color
color.hint: Colors along the center of the Y-axis tend to show up better on both the light and dark color schemes.

Page.title: Signup Confirmation
Page.subtitle: Confirm your account to start setting up your organization.
Page.emailMissing: Your e-mail address could not be decoded. Make sure you use the link sent in your confirmation e-mail.
Page.emailSent: We have sent you a confirmation email.
Page.instructions: In it, you will find a code that you may enter below to finish creating your account.

resend.success: If your account is pending confirmation, we've resent its confirmation code.

code.label: Confirmation Code
code.required: A confirmation code is required to confirm your account.

Page.title: Signup Verification
Page.subtitle: You will need to login so we can verify who is creating the organization.

email.label: E-Mail Address
email.required: An e-mail address is required to login.

password.label: Password
password.required: Your password is required to login.

Page.title: Create Organization
Page.subtitle: You will need to provide some basic information about your organization.

create.loading: Creating your organization and its administrator role.
create.success: Created your organization. Redirecting your browser.

name.label: Name
name.required: Your organization's name is needed to create it.

adminRoleName.label: Administrator Role's Name
adminRoleName.hint: The name of the role which will have access to every member and their permissions.
adminRoleName.required: Your administrator role's name is required to create your organization.

Page.title: Signup
Page.subtitle: Create your personal account using the form below.
Page.welcome: Welcome to Cerberus! This is a tool for managing your organization's members and their access to other applications.

name.label: Full Name
name.required: Your name is required to create your account.

email.label: E-Mail Address
email.required: Your e-mail address is required to create your account.

password.label: Password
password.hint: Your password must be at least 8 characters long. Strong passwords mix letters, numbers, and symbols.
password.minLength: Your password must be longer than 8 characters.
password.required: A password is required to create your account.
